content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"JIRA\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an issue tracking product, developed by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atlassian\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Atlassian\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". It provides bug tracking, issue tracking, and project management functions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Confluence\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is team collaboration software also designed by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atlassian\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Atlassian\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to meet the requirements of an enterprise knowledge management system (wiki).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Crowd\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a software application installed by the system administrator to connect one or more organization's applications. In particular, in EPAM Crowd connects Staffing Desk and AD with JIRA, Confluence, Fisheye and Crucible.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Review basic information about Atlassian Applications in article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/aWWQFg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Atlassian Applications - Jira, Confluence, Crowd\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study WI \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc=/project/epm-help/Shared%20Documents/PMC%20Instructions/EPM-HELP_JIRA_Confluence_and_Crowd.doc&action=default\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Jira, Confluence and Crowd\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn in more detail about the Atlassian applications used within EPAM and the different type of requests you may encounter. Also review article \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/HI7lFg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Troubleshooting access to JIRA and KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for more common cases.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
